abstract: Markus Kaarma of Missoula, Mont, is sentenced to 70 years in prison for killing German exchange student Diren Dede after he found teenager trespassing in his garage.
lead_paragraph: A Missoula homeowner was sentenced Thursday to 70 years in prison in the shotgun killing of a German exchange student who was trespassing in his garage.

headline.main: Montana: 70-Year Sentence in Killing of Exchange Student
headline.print_headline: Montana: 70-Year Sentence in Killing of Exchange Student

snippet: A Missoula homeowner was sentenced Thursday to 70 years in prison in the shotgun killing of a German exchange student who was trespassing in his garage.
